details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.3.2 Annotation dictionaries - Generic flag values
details.description: If present, the F key's Print flag bit shall be set to 1 and its Hidden, Invisible, ToggleNoView, and NoView flag bits shall be set to 0.

rule.description: If present, the F key's Print flag bit shall be set to 1 and its Hidden, Invisible, ToggleNoView, and NoView flag bits shall be set to 0.

error.message: Annotation flags are set the annotation to be hidden/invisible or non-printable (F = %1, Print = %2, Hidden = %3, Invisible = %4, NoView = %5, ToggleNoView = %6)
